getFullResponseOutputStream

public OutputStream getFullResponseOutputStream()
                                         throws IOException
This method returns an output stream to record the full HTML response. This method must be called AFTER the header fields are already written.

Returns:
the full response output stream. Return null if server-side recording is not enabled.
Throws:
IOException
